reviewText: The english subtitles are horrific. They seem to have been translated by a first grader with indirect knowledge of written english.

The show is excellent, one of the best from Japan.  Unfortunately this DVD set is shady at best.  Image quality isn't very good.  Only season 8 has English subtitles, and they're pretty poor quality ones (think Engrish/Chinglish).  If you understand Japanese or can read Chinese, it's not such a bad deal for all 8 seasons.  I'm just going to use the Chinese subtitles.
